snippet: Saira Khan and Eba Farook, the two sisters of Syed Rizwan Farook, said they were baffled by what had happened and that Mr. Farook showed “the very opposite of what we were taught.”
abstract: Saira Khan and Eba Farook, two sisters of San Bernardino, Calif, shooting suspect Syed Rizwan Farook, express anguish over event and insist they saw no signs that Farook and his wife Tashfeen Malik were preparing attack.
lead_paragraph: Saira Khan and Eba Farook, the two sisters of Syed Rizwan Farook, said they were baffled by what had happened and that Mr. Farook showed “the very opposite of what we were taught.”

headline.main: Sisters of San Bernardino Shooting Suspect Say They Saw No Warning Signs
headline.print_headline: Sisters of Shooting Suspect Say They Saw No Signs
